entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update .NET Linux Build for .NET 9 #91826
  • JIT: Switch memory barrier peephole to be on-demand #91825
    9.0.0
  • JIT doesn't fold constant multiplication to single instruction #91824
    Future
  • [mono][aot] MonoAOT BDN build crashing with SIGABRT #91819
    9.0.0
  • Type.GetInterfaceMap(Type) does not throw for open generic types #91816
  • claim loop when adding a claim to an identity #91814
  • [API Proposal]: Make HttpClient.Send() available on .NET Standard 2.0 #91810
  • Updating to .NET 8 Preview 7 from .NET 7 Different behavior on Configuration Binding #91823
    8.0.0
  • Empty .Net Core Runtime install folder is enough to break applications. #91806
  • [API Proposal]: Add `IEnumerable` extension for "unzipping" #91804
    Future
  • [debugger] `SteppingTests` fail on CI with "Detected a container, disabling sandboxing for debugger tests" #91801
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed '(jitIntrinsic->GetSimdSize() == 12) || (jitIntrinsic->GetSimdSize() == 16) || (jitIntrinsic->GetSimdSize() == 32)' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #91799
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'targetReg != REG_XMM0' during 'Generate code' #91798
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!"Duplicate gtTreeID was found"' during 'Importation' #91796
    8.0.0
  • Consider adding a `SearchValues<string>` specialization for two or three input strings #91795
    9.0.0
  • [mono] how to free object allocate using `mono_object_new_pinned` #91784
  • [MAIL] Create SSL enabled tests for `SmtpClient` #91776
    9.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Timeout waiting for CheckInspectLocalsAtBreakpointSite #91773
    9.0.0
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsWrite.Test_Write_T_ETW #91769
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Is there any way to remove DotNetRuntimeDebugHeader #90838
    9.0.0
  • Math.Pow behavior deviates from documentation #90725
    Future
  • Unexpected change in behavior with DateTime.AddSeconds() between .NET 6 and 7 #91820
  • Config generator emits uncompilable code for certain type conflicts #90976
    8.0.0
  • [Android][arm64] Use of undeclared identifier 'ICALL_SIG_TYPE__Bool' #91779
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Make `ValueTuple<>` implement `IFormattable` #90992
  • Negative double Formatting difference between .NET 6 and .NET Framework 472 #91777
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 38 Regressions on 8/31/2023 1:23:15 PM #91744
    8.0.0
  • [Analyzer] Use IndexOfAnyValues instead of inlined or cached array #78587
    8.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Eventpipe gcdump test failing on apple mobile platforms #90012
    9.0.0
  • Baseservices exceptions unhandled runtime test is failing on apple mobile platforms #91669
    9.0.0
  • Custom JsonIgnore condition #91789
  • 6.0 CI failure in System.Net.Http: we don't expect to call this after disposing and we don't handle the ODE #75568
    6.0.x
  • HttpResponseMessage #91036
    9.0.0
  • GC does not release memory easily on kubernetes cluster in workstation mode #49317
    9.0.0
  • Support DivRem intrinsincs in mono #82195
    9.0.0
  • Compat: multiple RuntimeType implementations in NativeAOT cause issue in WPF #70351
    Future
  • [NativeAot] Integrate SingleFileTestRunner to the default runner #70432
    Future
  • Plain struct not copied correctly when passed to method under certain conditions #89774
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Fix case where we illegally optimize away a memory barrier on ARM32/ARM64 #91827
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Mark `SString`'s single argument ctors as `explicit` #91822
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Converge Representations between NativeAOT and CoreCLR #91821
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] [maccatalyst] Make sure MacProxy is included in System.Net.Http #91817
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Optimize JitStressOnly #91815
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Detect aligned read in ReadUnaligned #91813
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • ARM64: Enable jumptable to BT optimization #91811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [CI][Android] Build mono runtime for Android on PRs #91809
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Dont' use bareword `bool` in icall sig macros #91808
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Use g_malloc instead of malloc in giconv.c. #91807
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • WIP: [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/8.0] Added missing *Async overrides to TlsStream #91794
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Check DotNetFinalVersionKind when setting WorkloadVersionSuffix #91792
    needs-area-label
  • Check DotNetFinalVersionKind when setting WorkloadVersionSuffix #91791
    needs-area-label
  • Fix handling of variant casting in the managed type system #91788
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [MT][debugger] Block failing test `MiscTests.TestDebugUsingMultiThreadedRuntime` #91787
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-Debugger-mono
  • [Mono][WASM][Test] Unblock JIT/SIMD/Vector3Interop_r/Vector3Interop_r.sh #91786
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Handle "successful error cases" in near differ on arm64 #91783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't log warnings for certain RemoveAttributeInstances #91782
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove blocking on a test for native AOT #91781
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Start running test added in #89061 #91780
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Remove uses of IlcTrimMetadata from the test tree #91774
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Make it possible to remove DotNetRuntimeDebugHeader #91775
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64-RISCV64] Refactor the profiler for LoongArch64 and also fix some errors for RISCV64. #91722
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] ELT profiler: fix reconstruction of struct args passed partially on the stack #91797
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Avoid compiling the same method multiple times during dedup. #91802
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Revert "[c11] define mono atomics in terms of standard atomics" #91812
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [iOS] Fix trimming warnings in HttpClientHandler.AnyMobile #91520
    area-System.Net.Http, linkable-framework, os-ios
  • Remove unnecessary imports #91701
    needs-area-label
  • GC finalization cleanup #91129
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Separate running PAL tests out to their own jobs/steps. #91643
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [mono][infra] Fix mono-aot-cross build for linux-arm64 using biarch image #91019
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Call mono_gc_init_finalizer_thread to allow gc thread creation #91785
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Disable exceptions unhandled runtime test on apple mobile platforms #91790
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Added missing *Async overrides to TlsStream #91750
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Enable analyzer analyzers #91733
    area-Meta
  • Fix whole program optimization option for Windows #91759
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • ARM64: Use stlur for volatile stores #91553
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Enable all X86Base intrinsics #91393
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Don't truncate the high bits when ldelema index is nint #88986
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm] Add missing file in blazor-frame #91778
    area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix the trimming.sln after the recent rename of a test project #91730
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix partial trimming of assemblies on referenced in metadata #91713
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Split the informational version on both SemVer2 separators when calculating TFM #91760
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, blocking-release
  • Split the informational version on both SemVer2 separators when calculating TFM #91758
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator

Updated

  • Metrics Feature Switch #91767
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Delete the RequiresPreviewFeaturesAttribute from RefreshMemoryLimit #91688
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix analyzer failure where incorrect SemanticModel is used #91764
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [NOT READY] GC: Rearrange finalization queue to put freelist in middle #91029
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove dependencies on non-live illink #91468
    needs-area-label
  • Add New Test to Track Number of Jitted Methods #91235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] [wasm] Refactor Request Streaming to use HttpContent.CopyToAsync #91699
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Remove public provider from rundown session #91383
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Arm64: Pass the small size accurately to emitIns_valid_imm_for_ldst_offset #91741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT SuperPMI collections #91037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add package readmes #91210
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [maccatalyst] Make sure MacProxy is included in System.Net.Http #91599
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http
  • Improve binder gen binding logic (init, member binding, polymorphism) #91717
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Do not throw PNSE exception from NegotiateAuthentication constructor #91753
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Reenable consumption of PGO data #91297
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Test improvements for #8418 on CI #91694
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix a potential shutdown hang with `Environment.Exit()` on Windows depending on timing with GCs #91739
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Convert all tests under baseservices to the merged test infrastructure #91560
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Expose an internal ISimdVector interface and being using it to deduplicate some SIMD code #90764
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [NativeAOT] Switch macOS to mmap thunks like iOS platforms #91751
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Emit less metadata for not-reflection-visible types #91703
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Handle mistyped commas in morph in pre-order too #91718
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasi] Work arounbd WASI's mmap implementation not returning aligned m… #91761
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Cleanup unused runtime functions #91681
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0] Fix Dispose and SendData Race on Http3 Test #91690
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Type load checks do not fail at compile time but produce a runtime exception #91261
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Basic SIMD support for System.Numerics.Vector2 on arm64 #91659
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][metadata] Fixes for static virtual methods with interface variance #91664
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [browser][MT] enable all MT library tests on the runtime CI pipeline #91536
    arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, area-Build-mono
  • Don't shut down event pipe in DLLs on Windows #91715
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] wasm symbols #91241
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Fold some bitwise operations to vpternlog #91227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • DNMD in Mono #91487
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-meta-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet help` dumps stack in GitHub Codespaces #35248
  • `dotnet --info` includes two RID values with .NET 8 #35237

Closed

  • `dotnet restore` being stuck indefinitely #34987

PullRequests

Created

  • Make HelpCommand use the runtime to launch HTML #35255
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Update Newtonsoft.Json from 13.0.1 to 13.0.3 #35253
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35251
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Containers] Validate that user applications will run on the selected base image #35246
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add support for Haiku #35231
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • test pr 2 #33835 cache #35228
    Area-Tools

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2263045 #35245
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35225
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix: resource typo #35208
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #35223
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2262759 #35226
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [main] Update dotnet/runtime #35048
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #35088
    Area-Tools
  • Avoid loading all types when invoking Hot Reload handlers, handle type load failures #35077
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Side by side workload manifests and garbage collection for file based installs #35106
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • test pr for #33835 uninstaller #35195
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add --no-http-cache option #35107
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add test for PublishSingleFile+PublishAot #34948
    untriaged, Area-ILLink

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-08

PullRequests

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Refresh ILVerify and file runtime issues as needed #69860
    17.9
  • `Inline temporary variable` fixer on a reference-type `var` regresses nullability #69859
  • `dotnet format` fails with error CS0246: The type or namespace name 'XYZ' could not be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference? #69858

Closed

  • Unexpected CS1573 with XML docs that are already inherited #69126
  • CS0111 error upon rebuild #68895
  • Collection expressions: interface target types should be limited to specific System.Collections.Generic interfaces #69839
  • Parse errors when conditional directives are combined with raw string literals #69776
    17.8
  • Roslyn has introduced many source-built prebuilts #69847
  • Bad top-level program syntax results in assertion in `LexicalSortKey` #67050
    C# 12.0
  • Static fields in interfaces should cause the compiler to emit `beforefieldinit` on the interface #69413
    17.9
  • Diagnostics not refreshed in FSA with editorconfig option changes #69763
  • ExportCodeFixProvider should be marked as Inherited = false #69809
    17.8 P4

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce work done in operator overload syntax classifier. #69866
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add tasks for running a new vscode instance with a specific language server #69865
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix issue with stale cached data in LSP pull diagnostics #69864
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Bring LSP pull diagnostic range-computation more in line with how our squiggle tagger does things. #69861
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Create a brokered service to delegate loading of projects to us #69857
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: type inference from spread elements #69856
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions

Merged

  • Collection expressions: support builder methods returning derived or implementing types #69770
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify diagnostic squiggling code #69862
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: interface target types should be limited to specific System.Collections.Generic interfaces #69842
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next
  • Properly support (and reject) a limited set of preprocessor directive scenarios for 'use expression body'. #69849
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Randomize analyzer instantiation to avoid static constructor/jit contention #69838
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix source build trying to consume StreamJsonRpc #69854
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure location of a "simple program" type refers to a source tree #69845
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Simple Programs, untriaged, Next
  • Emit BeforeFieldInit flag on interfaces #69850
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, untriaged, Next
  • Update "Current Document" background analysis semantics and fix Full Solution analysis with project config changes #69750
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Mark export attributes as Inherited = false #69810
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Add support for reading runsettings passed by the client #69792
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Improve GetNextToken / GetPreviousToken perf #69740
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Optimize `T ?? null` to `T` where `T` is a reference type #69803
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesize readonly list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #69802
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Nullable conversion of collection expressions #69852
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Update the C# syntax generator to use a few more modern C# constructs. #69703
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle long extension invocation chains #69831
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Compiler support for respecting custom configured analyzer severity settings #69843
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • IDE changes for respecting code style severity from 'option_name = option_value:severity' entries in command line builds #69844
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle non-member-overriding context in OverrideCompletion #69855
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #50598
  • CSS loading issue in Blazor Server app when Changing environment variable to "Production" #50595
  • Re-evaluate enhanced nav to non-Blazor endpoints #50591
  • SSR and Fetch with Azure Front Door #50587
  • Blazor webassembly does not initialize components in the `LayoutComponentBase` after webassembly resources downloaded. #50585
  • Validation for MetadataType using Custom validation attribute #50584
  • User's Email Claim is always returned emtpy #50583
  • [Blazor] Changing a parameter with default value to nullable causes it's name not to be unique when using hot reload #50579

Closed

  • Introduce a Shared DynamicObject for Cross-Controller Data Exchange #50559
  • With rc1, an error occurs when a custom layout is needed. #50597
  • .NET 7 regression generic array parameters 35980 #48526
  • PreventDefault not working in next 13 #50581
  • ASP.NET Core Module fails to load the runtime when the Null Service is stopped #46544
    8.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Versions.props to latest Microsoft.Identity.Web 2.13.4 #50594
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Implement IDirectoryContents on ManifestDirectoryInfo #50586
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Update Versions.props to latest Microsoft.Identity.Web #50582
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50596
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Form mapping support for select multiple, logging, DataMember and other improvements/cleanups #50431
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] Obsolete Router.PreferExactMatches #50545
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50580
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump actions/checkout from 3 to 4 #50590
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Update gRPC packages for .NET 8 templates #50568
    area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 8.0-rc2
  • Fix IIS OutOfProc sometimes creating multiple app instances after recycle #50535
    feature-iis, area-networking, 8.0-rc2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50576
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, area-networking, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Add feature to expose IIS hosting details #50443
    area-networking
  • WIP: Add automated Blazor WebView test using Photino #50347
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update Blazor WebAssembly template #50554
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Startup API cleanups #50571
    area-blazor
  • Enhanced navigation redirections. Make form enhancement opt-in. #50551
    area-blazor
  • Fix Set size in HttpLoggingOptions #50426
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Persist Prerendered State #50373
    area-blazor
  • Support resolving IFormFile in complex form mapping #50537
    area-blazor
  • Add ProblemDetials.Extensions to ControllerBase.Problem and ControllerBase.ValidationProblem #50204
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • sos command fails with The ClrRuntime service is required by the Runtime property with .NET 8 on RHEL8 arm64 #4220

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS/Mac] CollectionView does not respect ItemSource DataTemplate height/width constraints #17285
  • CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled #17283
  • [iOS] Drag and Drop Request Full-Size Previews #17281
  • Maui iOS - Search bar won't focus after clearing #17280
  • MAUI Autogenerate icons for Mac Catalyst & iOS #17279
  • iOS, Android Border calculates it's size in a wrong way #17275
  • CollectionView can't show all items #17274
  • ListView crashes application #17273
  • Image taken by Binding and IValueConverter is not shown #17272
  • Windows: Connectivity check sometimes return NetworkAccess.Unknown #17270
  • Webview on Android devices don't send __RequestVerificationToken to MVC endpoint with [ValidateAntiForgeryToken] annotation #17269
  • iPad physical device won't open any maui app. (Maui Net8 P7) #17268
    .NET 8 GA
  • `Shell.Current.DisplayPromptAsync` doesn't react on `Enter` press on `WinUI` #17266
  • Precompiling failed error after enabling LLVM on Android release builds #17263
    .NET 8 GA

Closed

  • Method not found: void Microsoft.Maui.Controls.TapGestureRecognizer.add_Tapped(System.EventHandler) in .Net MAUI targeting .Net 7 #17147
  • Issues with the emulator #17259
  • .NET 8 RC1 cannot use Syncfusion controls - SfListView gives System.TypeLoadException #17265
    .NET 8 GA
  • When the OnColor property of Switch is set, it is applied even if when Off on iOS / Mac #15074
    Backlog
  • MacOS And Windows frame error #8138
    Backlog
  • Style values are being applied too early #14678
    .NET 8 GA
  • Android AAB file > 150 M limitation on Google Play Console #17191
  • [Windows] Fix CollectionView tests that have regressed #15529
    .NET 8 GA
  • CollectionView has default spacing between items on Windows which I cannot remove #12495
    .NET 8 GA

PullRequests

Created

  • Add several InputTransparent UI tests #17286
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #17284
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • Enable requesting the full preview size on iOS drag shadow #17282
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area/gestures
  • [X] don't expant types to Extension for x:Static #17276
    area/Xaml </>, Under Consideration
  • Update the macios dependencies to new package names. #17267
    .NET 8 GA

Merged

  • [build] Move to rc2 packages #17278
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • A property on a nested owned entity is not being saved in the CosmosDB document #31664

Closed

  • Migrations: Compile error when using complex types #31665
    8.0.0-rc2
  • Migrations and model snapshot for primitive collections #31414
    8.0.0-rc2
  • DateOnly/TimeOnly with JSON exceptions in preview 4 #30885
    8.0.0
  • Parameter for collection of enum values contains ints even when correlated column has strings #30921
    8.0.0-rc2
  • Primitive collection metadata not configured for shadow collection properties #31469
    8.0.0-rc2
  • Best pratice for DB downgrade through efbundle in CI/CD #31637
  • How to use EF Core in REST and gRPC Services? #31500

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31669
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.2.1 to 8.2.2 #31628
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Migrations: Fix ComplexPropertyBuilder.IsRequired call in snapshot #31666
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31667
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [TEST ONLY] Add tests for #30885 - DateOnly/TimeOnly with JSON exceptions in preview 4 #31663
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Set the key comparer as well as the normal comparer when mapping a primitive collection #31661
